page.title: 09TRAFFIC IN GURNARD.
page.content: The roads in Gurnard are not very busy.Most traffic coming into Gurnard comes up Tuttons Hill.It is mostly private cars.There is plenty of room for parking in Worsley Road because it is such a wide road.Church Road is very narrow and people park cars in the road because they don't have garages. It is difficult to drive along with all the parked cars.I checked on the makes of cars parked in Gurnard.There were more foreign than British cars(16 foreign,8 British).The most popular car was Ford.
